metadata.name: The Binding of Isaac Holybirthâ€
metadata.description:
[img]http://i.imgur.com/jpK1Fas.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/mDmhrg4.png[/img] Welcome to a brand new expansion for The Binding of Isaac, this new expansion is gonna be the biggest you've ever seen for your favorite roguelike indie game! We are Nicalo and we are the development team of The Binding of Isaac Holybirth, we are currently with 22 members and this group will increase during the year, we will be working on this project for the whole year and we bring out daily updates so you guys can explore new content every single day! [img]http://i.imgur.com/9Vcciv9.png[/img] - Brand NEW Custom Menu Soundtrack! - New Original Items - New Bosses - New Items - New Monsters - New Pills - New Special Characters - New Challenges - New Floors - New Rooms - New Cards - New Pickups - New Icons - New HUD Icons AND MUCH MORE! [img]http://i.imgur.com/bhz2hDS.png[/img] - 200 NEW Items - 100 NEW Enemies - 500 NEW Rooms - 7 New RoomTypes - New Pickups - New Cards - 20 NEW Bosses - 70 NEW Trinkets - Soundtracks for every Floor - 200 NEW Costumes - New HUD Display - 30 NEW Transformations - NEW Gameplay Mechanics & Many Many More! [img]http://i.imgur.com/oJpRDOg.png[/img] Update Log January 22 2017 Alpha 1.08 -NEW Bosses: Duke of Demons & Holy Monstro -3 NEW Items Five Finger Death Punch, Ice Ball & Fever -1 NEW Trinket The Pain Get Damage Up On Curse Floor! - 40 NEW Enemy Replacements - New Soundtracks for Basement, The Cellar and Burning Basement - Brand new Backdrops for Basement,The Cellar,Burning Basement,Caves,Catacombs,Flooded Caves,Sheol and more - New Player Portrait for both Jesus and TheSoulless - Fixed Black hearts & Bombs for TheSoulless - Removed Red Debug Text
Check back next week for a new update of The Binding of Isaac Holybirth! We are so excited to keep bringing out more updates daily along the way, and we hope that you guys will love our mod. Enjoy!
Jesus Head is from the Savior Mod made by "otherhand42" please support his mod aswell! https://moddingofisaac.com/mod/93/the-savior-mod-pack
